sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Mail, Eye, Edit } from 'lucide-react'; const CustomerTable = ({ customers, onSelectCustomer }) => { const getCreditStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'excellent': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'good': return 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-800'; case 'watch': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'hold': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; case 'cash_only': return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (
{customers.map((customer) => ( ))}
Customer Type Credit Limit Balance Overdue Credit Status Last Payment Actions
{customer.name}
{customer.id}
{customer.email}
{customer.customerType.replace('_', ' ')} ${customer.creditLimit.toLocaleString()}
${customer.totalOwed.toFixed(2)}
{customer.invoiceCount} invoices
{customer.overdueAmount > 0 ? ( ${customer.overdueAmount.toFixed(2)} ) : ( $0.00 )} {customer.creditStatus.replace('_', ' ')} {customer.lastPayment}
); }; export default CustomerTable;
